src:
【豪門爆姦情3】不倫六年每週二固定約會　千金小三臉書放閃露餡
05 Nov 2019, 21:58 by 娛樂組, 攝影組
根據讀者的爆料，元祖食品少東張劭緯從2013年，就開始與大黑松小倆口的千金邱威樺搞外遇。兩人6年來暗偷款曲，不僅一起親暱打球、看診、到陽明山玩樂，還多次出國至日本遊玩、到夜店玩耍，甚至到旅館開房、在浴室自拍，兩人甚至於2014年在晶華酒店買情侶對戒。



邱威樺臉書中所使用的大頭照就「大有玄機」，照片中的她，頸上圍一條紅色圍巾，並站在紅色楓葉前、伸手觸摸楓葉，笑得相當幸福，仔細看她伸出的左手，中指就是戴著情侶戒，至於圖說她則寫道：「哥哥用萊卡拍的照片出爐了～太喜歡了（愛心），有帥氣哥哥當攝影師一起出國真好～炫耀無誤」，最後加上大笑的圖案，顯示當時的她心情既興奮又想放閃。








據查，邱威樺字句中所指的「帥氣哥哥」就是張劭緯！邱威樺知道自己是小三，不能公開與張劭緯之間的關係，只好在自己臉書向朋友炫耀，還把不能公開的情侶戒放在臉書中，此舉等於是想向朋友透露自己是個「有情人」的死會女，並懷著不倫姦情的暗自雀躍，字裡行間透露那次出國是情人伴遊。








此外，兩人今年3月也到日本箱根遊玩，拍下不少愛的合照。對照邱威樺的臉書來看，她曾為了自家產品在東京舉辦食品展，於3月在當地打卡，似乎有點巧合。尤其張劭緯私下稱呼對方為「寶貝」，而且有段時日以看診為由，固定星期二晚上與邱威樺幽會。
更新時間｜2019.11.06 04:38
text:
[Grandeur swindling love 3] Indefinitely six years fixed date on Tuesdays
05 Nov 2019, 21:58 by Entertainment Group, Photography Group
According to the reader's breaking news, Yuanzu Food Shaodong Zhang Weiwei began to engage in an affair with Qianjin Qiuwei of the big black pines in 2013. The two men secretly stole songs for 6 years, not only playing with relatives, seeing doctors, playing in Yangmingshan, but also going abroad to Japan for fun, going to nightclubs, even going to the hotel to open a room, taking a selfie in the bathroom, the two even in 2014 Jinghua Hotel buys a couple ring.



The big photo used in Qiu Weihua’s Facebook book is “a mystery.” In the photo, she has a red scarf around her neck and stands in front of the red maple leaf. She reaches for the maple leaf and smiles very happily. Look carefully at her outstretched. In the left hand, the middle finger is wearing a couple ring. As for the picture, she wrote: "The picture taken by my brother with Lycra is released~ I like it too much (love), it is really good to have a handsome brother to go abroad as a photographer. The pattern of laughing at the show shows that her mood is both excited and wants to flash.








According to the investigation, the "handsome brother" referred to in Qiu Weihua's sentence is Zhang Weiwei! Qiu Weihua knows that he is a junior, can't openly communicate with Zhang Weiwei, and has to show off his face to his friends on his Facebook. He also puts a couple who can't be publicly exposed in Facebook. This is equivalent to revealing to a friend that he is a "lover." The dead woman, and with the insults of the ecstasy secretly jumped, the words revealed that the trip abroad is a lover escort.








In addition, the two also went to Hakone, Japan in March this year, and took a lot of pictures of love. According to Qiu Weihua's Facebook, she once held a food exhibition in Tokyo for her own products, and it was a coincidence that she had a local card in March. In particular, Zhang Weiwei privately called the other party "baby", and there was a time to see the doctor for a period of time, fixed on Tuesday night with Qiu Weihua.
Update time|2019.11.06 04:38
